1.name: Blade Runner
1.description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

2.name: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
2.description: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

3.name: The Thing
3.description: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

4.name: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
4.description: A group of Southern California high school students are enjoying their most important subjects: sex, drugs, and rock n' roll.

5.name: First Blood
5.description: A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.

6.name: Parasite
6.description: Paul Dean has created a deadly parasite that is now attached to his stomach. He and his female companion, Patricia Welles, must find a way to destroy it while also trying to avoid Ricus, ...                See full summary »

7.name: An Officer and a Gentleman
7.description: A young man must complete his work at a Navy Officer Candidate School to become an aviator, with the help of a tough Gunnery Sergeant and his new girlfriend.

8.name: The Slumber Party Massacre
8.description: A high school student's slumber party turns terrifying as an escaped mental patient with a drill decides to crash the evening.

9.name: The King of Comedy
9.description: Rupert Pupkin is a passionate yet unsuccessful comic who craves nothing more than to be in the spotlight and to achieve this, he stalks and kidnaps his idol to take the spotlight for himself.

10.name: Conan the Barbarian
10.description: A young boy, Conan, becomes a slave after his parents are killed and tribe destroyed by a savage warlord and sorcerer, Thulsa Doom. When he grows up he becomes a fearless, invincible fighter. Set free, he plots revenge against Thulsa Doom.

11.name: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
11.description: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

12.name: Tootsie
12.description: Michael Dorsey, an unsuccessful actor, disguises himself as a woman in order to get a role on a trashy hospital soap.

13.name: 48 Hrs.
13.description: A hard-nosed cop reluctantly teams up with a wise-cracking criminal temporarily paroled to him, in order to track down a killer.

14.name: TRON
14.description: A computer hacker is abducted into the digital world and forced to participate in gladiatorial games where his only chance of escape is with the help of a heroic security program.

15.name: Grease 2
15.description: A British student at a 1960s American high school must prove himself to the leader of a girls' gang whose members can only date greasers.

16.name: Poltergeist
16.description: A family's home is haunted by a host of demonic ghosts.

17.name: Gandhi
17.description: Mohandas K. Gandhi's character is fully explained as a man of nonviolence. Through his patience, he is able to drive the British out of the subcontinent. And the stubborn nature of Jinnah and his commitment towards Pakistan is portrayed.

18.name: Annie
18.description: A young orphan girl's adventures in finding a family that will take her.

19.name: Sophie's Choice
19.description: Sophie is the survivor of Nazi concentration camps, who has found a reason to live with Nathan, a sparkling if unsteady American Jew obsessed with the Holocaust.

20.name: The Man from Snowy River
20.description: In 1880s Australia, after young Jim Craig's father dies, Jim takes a job at the Harrison cattle ranch, where he is forced to become a man.

21.name: The Dark Crystal
21.description: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and so restore order to his world.

22.name: Cat People
22.description: A young woman's sexual awakening brings horror when she discovers her urges transform her into a monstrous black leopard.

23.name: Fanny och Alexander
23.description: Two young Swedish children experience the many comedies and tragedies of their family, the Ekdahls.

24.name: The Beastmaster
24.description: A sword-and-sorcery fantasy about a young man's search for revenge. Armed with supernatural powers, the handsome hero and his animal allies wage war against marauding forces.

25.name: Creepshow
25.description: An anthology which tells five terrifying tales based on the E.C. horror comic books of the 1950s.

26.name: Airplane II: The Sequel
26.description: A faulty computer causes a passenger space shuttle to head straight for the Sun. Can Ted Striker save the day and get the shuttle back on track - again?

27.name: The Entity
27.description: A woman is tormented and sexually molested by an invisible demon.

28.name: Rocky III
28.description: After winning the ultimate title and being the world champion, Rocky falls into a hole and finds himself picked up by a former enemy.

29.name: Friday the 13th Part III
29.description: Having revived from his wounds, Jason Voorhees takes refuge at a cabin near Crystal Lake. As a group of co-eds arrive for their vacation, Jason continues his killing spree.

30.name: The Year of Living Dangerously
30.description: A young Australian reporter tries to navigate the political turmoil of Indonesia during the rule of President Sukarno with the help of a diminutive photographer.

31.name: The Secret of NIMH
31.description: To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she ever suspected.

32.name: Pink Floyd: The Wall
32.description: A confined but troubled rock star descends into madness in the midst of his physical and social isolation from everyone.

33.name: The Verdict
33.description: A lawyer sees the chance to salvage his career and self-respect by taking a medical malpractice case to trial rather than settling.

34.name: Zapped!
34.description: A high school science nerd gains telekinetic powers after a laboratory accident and uses them for revenge upon bullies.

35.name: Forbidden World
35.description: In the distant future, a federation marshal arrives at a research lab on a remote planet where a genetic experiment has gotten loose and begins feeding on the dwindling scientific group.

36.name: The Last American Virgin
36.description: The friendship of a group of young friends struggling with teen sex, drugs, and work is jeopardized by a romantic interest which may turn pals into bitter rivals.

37.name: Ladies and Gentlemen, the Fabulous Stains
37.description: The media and disaffected teens mistake the acerbic rants of an obnoxious teenage punk rocker as a rallying cry for the women of America, launching her and her talentless group to national stardom.

38.name: Swamp Thing
38.description: After a violent incident with a special chemical, a research scientist is turned into a swamp plant monster.

39.name: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
39.description: A town's Sheriff and regular patron of a historical whorehouse fights to keep it running when a television reporter targets it as the Devil's playhouse.

40.name: The House on Sorority Row
40.description: After a seemingly innocent prank goes horribly wrong, a group of sorority sisters are stalked and murdered one by one in their sorority house while throwing a party to celebrate their graduation.

41.name: The Sword and the Sorcerer
41.description: A mercenary with a three-bladed sword rediscovers his royal heritage's dangerous future when he is recruited to help a princess foil the designs of a brutal tyrant and a powerful sorcerer in conquering a land.

42.name: Fitzcarraldo
42.description: The story of Brian Sweeney Fitzgerald, an extremely determined man who intends to build an opera house in the middle of a jungle.

43.name: Death Wish II
43.description: Architect Paul Kersey once again becomes a vigilante when he tries to find the five street punks who murdered his daughter and housekeeper, this time on the dark streets of Los Angeles.

44.name: Missing
44.description: When an idealistic American writer disappears during the Chilean coup d'état in September 1973, his wife and father try to find him.

45.name: The Last Unicorn
45.description: A brave unicorn (Mia Farrow) and a magician (Alan Arkin) fight an evil King (Sir Christopher Lee), who is obsessed with attempting to capture the world's unicorns.

46.name: Victor Victoria
46.description: A struggling female soprano finds work playing a male female impersonator, but it complicates her personal life.

47.name: Class of 1984
47.description: A new teacher at a troubled inner-city high school soon ends up clashing with the delinquent leader of a punk posse that runs the school.

48.name: Halloween III: Season of the Witch
48.description: Kids all over America want Silver Shamrock masks for Halloween. Doctor Daniel Challis seeks to uncover a plot by Silver Shamrock owner Conal Cochran.

49.name: Sorceress
49.description: Sword and sorcery story of the cosmic struggle between white magic and black magic.

50.name: The World According to Garp
50.description: A struggling young writer finds his life and work dominated by his unfaithful wife and his radical feminist mother, whose best-selling manifesto turns her into a cultural icon.
